T02D1577:8a-0: @8a # // dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D1577:8a-1: / bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
T02D1577:8a-2: kun nas dad pas phyag byas te //
T02D1577:8a-3: dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1577:8a-4: rjes su gzung phyir sbyin sreg brtsam //
T02D1577:8a-6: 'dod pa'i don kun sbyin sreg gis //
T02D1577:8a-7: thogs pa med par 'grub pas na //
T02D1577:8a-8: phan gdags tshar bcad thams cad la //
T02D1577:8a-9: thog mar 'gro ba las kyi mchog / bdag dang gzhan las don gyi phyir //
T02D1577:8a-10: bla ma'i rim pa ji lta bar //
T02D1577:8a-11: mkhas pa rnams kyi rjes 'brang bri //
T02D1577:8a-12: srod dam snga dro shar phyogs su //
T02D1577:8a-13: khru gang sor bcu gnyis zabs thab //
T02D1577:8a-14: zlum po ba byung dkar rtsis byugs ;
T02D1577:8a-15: / kha khyer sor bzhi pas bskor ba'i //
T02D1577:8a-17: steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02D1577:8a-18: mtshams su rdo rje rtse gsum dgod //
T02D1577:8a-19: ku sha'i rtse mo phyir bstan pas //
T02D1577:8a-20: bkram ste thab tu shing brtsigs la //
T02D1577:8a-21: dri dkar po yi chus bkang ba'i //
T02D1577:8a-22: mchod yon 'bru dang me tog bcas //
T02D1577:8a-23: g-yas su bzhag ste byin gyis brlab //
T02D1577:8a-24: mchod pa lnga yang dkar por bsham //
T02D1577:8a-25: de bzhin gnod sbyin bum par bya //
T02D1577:8a-26: nas 'bras yas til yungs kar zho //
T02D1577:8a-28: mngar gsum la sogs g-yon bzhag ste //
T02D1577:8a-29: rtse mo'i tsha las byung ba'i shing //
T02D1577:8a-30: 'o ma can mdzes mtho gang tshad //
T02D1577:8a-31: dris byugs mar dang sbrang rtsis spags //
T02D1577:8a-32: bud shing srog chags med ma rul //
T02D1577:8a-33: yang na ba lang lci ba yis //
T02D1577:8a-34: thab bcas cung zad rab tu brtsig / yang na bdud rtsi lngas byugs pa'i //
T02D1577:8b-0: mandala steng du zlum por @8b byug ;
T02D1577:8b-1: / de nas slob dpon slob mar bcas //
T02D1577:8b-2: khrus byas dris byug gos dang rgyan //
T02D1577:8b-3: chas te der 'dug zhi sems kyis //
T02D1577:8b-4: khyab pa'i snying rje mngon byas te //
T02D1577:8b-5: srung ba sngon du 'gro ba yis //
T02D1577:8b-6: rang gi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1577:8b-7: gnyis su med pa'i mchod byas nas//
T02D1577:8b-8: nam mkha' la ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1577:8b-9: dang po tsham dam sngags kyis thab //
T02D1577:8b-10: rdzas dang sngags bdag bcas pa bsangs //
T02D1577:8b-11: rdo rje se go la bcas nas ni //
T02D1577:8b-12: mtshams bcad yan lag byin brlabs nas //
T02D1577:8b-13: thab de bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02D1577:8b-15: aom ram las skyes pad nyi ma //
T02D1577:8b-16: h'um las me lha dmar ser bskyed //
T02D1577:8b-17: zhal gcig phyag bzhi thor tshugs can //
T02D1577:8b-18: dbyug pa dang ni skyabs sbyin dang //
T02D1577:8b-19: ril ba bgrang phreng 'dzin bltas la //
T02D1577:8b-20: grub pa'i lha dang gnyis med bya //
T02D1577:8b-21: drang ba'i phyag rgya bcas nas su//
T02D1577:8b-22: h'um dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02D1577:8b-23: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02D1577:8b-24: sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du //
T02D1577:8b-25: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1577:8b-26: dza: h'um bam ho: aagna ye a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02D1577:8b-27: padma ka ma la ya stvam /
T02D1577:8b-28: zhes pas me tog por la gdan phul te /
T02D1577:8b-29: bgegs bsal la zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02D1577:8b-30: me tog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D1577:8b-31: aom aagna yes ma ya h'um sa ma ya stvam /
T02D1577:8b-32: lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams la /
T02D1577:8b-33: aom badzra dzva la h'um phat /
T02D1577:8b-34: snying gar aa las rdo rje bsgom //
T02D1577:8b-35: rtse lnga par ldan phyag rgya che //
T02D1577:8b-36: snying gar zla ba h'um rdo rje //
T02D1577:8b-37: sngar bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
T02D1577:8b-38: dbang bskur ba ni bsam par bya //
T02D1577:8b-39: h'um rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02D1577:8b-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1577:8b-42: rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed //
T02D1577:8b-43: aom sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02D1577:8b-45: bdag gi yas 'di sgrubs zhes bsgo //
T02D1577:8b-47: aom dzva la ram dzva la ram /
T02D1577:8b-48: dgon pa'am rgyun bzhag byams sems me //
T02D1577:8b-49: rlung yab kyis sbar mchod pa dbul //
T02D1577:9a-0: @9a * // zhabs bsil dang mchod yon ji ltar rigs par dbul lo //
T02D1577:9a-1: de nas rdzas rnams gus par du //
T02D1577:9a-2: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D1577:9a-3: gzar bu bzung ste sreg rdzas dbul //
T02D1577:9a-4: aom aagna ye ha bya di bya de ba ye sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1577:9a-5: dang por zhun mar lan gsum dbul //
T02D1577:9a-6: de nas sreg rdzas rim pa bzhin //
T02D1577:9a-7: phul te gnyis su med par bya //
T02D1577:9a-8: aom badzra aa na l'arka ma h'a dushta dzva la ya /
T02D1577:9a-10: tri ta hr'i: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D1577:9a-11: mthar yang mar gyi dgang blugs dbul //
T02D1577:9a-13: bstod de bzod par gsol ba gdab //
T02D1577:9a-14: gnang bar bstod pa bya ba yin //
T02D1577:9a-15: aom tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras //
T02D1577:9a-16: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /'byung po kun gyi mgon 'gyur ba //
T02D1577:9a-17: dge ba dri med phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1577:9a-18: gzi brjid chen po me yi lha //
T02D1577:9a-19: 'dod pa thams cad rab ster mdzad //
T02D1577:9a-20: bdag dang gzhan don bsgrub la bzhugs //
T02D1577:9a-22: me lha drang srong chen po la phrin las su gsol ba ni /
T02D1577:9a-23: bdag dang yon bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la
T02D1577:9a-24: sogs pa'i tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i legs pa'i bar
T02D1577:9a-25: du gcod pa'i sdig pa dang bgegs rnams zhi bar
T02D1577:9a-26: gyur cig / thab khung me tog gtor nas ni
T02D1577:9a-27: // me yi lha la las bcol te //
T02D1577:9a-28: 'bar ba'i rnam pa nyid du blta //
T02D1577:9a-29: de nas bsang gtor byas nas kyang //
T02D1577:9a-30: dag pa gsum gyi ngang las der //
T02D1577:9a-32: der ni 'byung po'i ro steng du //
T02D1577:9a-33: rang snying sa bon las spros pa'i //
T02D1577:9a-34: 'od zer lnga ldan h'um spros te //
T02D1577:9a-35: de las 'khor lo gsum gyi lhas //
T02D1577:9a-36: dngos po thams cad ro gcig par //
T02D1577:9a-37: bsgrubs te slar zhugs dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D1577:9a-38: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te //
T02D1577:9a-39: bgegs bsal mchod yon phul nas su //
T02D1577:9a-40: h'um thugs rje chen po rgyun gyi rgyun //
T02D1577:9a-41: grub pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1577:9a-42: sems can thams cad rjes gzung phyir //
T02D1577:9a-43: 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs gsol ba //
T02D1577:9b-0: gang ba'i sbyin sreg gsum @9b byas la //
T02D1577:9b-1: mchod cing sna tshogs mchod byas nas //
T02D1577:9b-2: rim pa bzhin du sreg blugs dbul //
T02D1577:9b-3: grub pa mo yi sngags gzhug ste //
T02D1577:9b-4: sarba p'a pam sarba mi bighr'am /
T02D1577:9b-5: sarba by'a dhi sarba du rsvapna /
T02D1577:9b-12: sbyin sreg brgya stong byas nas su //
T02D1577:9b-13: mchod pa kun gyis mnyes par bya //
T02D1577:9b-14: bstod cing bzod gsol gsol ba gdab //
T02D1577:9b-15: de nas gang ba'i sreg blugs kyi //
T02D1577:9b-16: gzi brjid 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i zhal //
T02D1577:9b-17: rab tu 'bar ba drag po ste //
T02D1577:9b-18: yo byad gcig tu bsres pa dang ;
T02D1577:9b-19: / gnyis su med pa'i sbyin par bya //
T02D1577:9b-20: ci nus pa dang ci 'byor pas //
T02D1577:9b-21: shin tu rnam par dag par bya //
T02D1577:9b-22: mi 'chi lnga bcas dpa' bo yis //
T02D1577:9b-23: shin tu tshim par mchod byas la //
T02D1577:9b-24: de nas ts'a ru la 'bad pas //
T02D1577:9b-25: spun dang srin mo dga' ston bya //
T02D1577:9b-26: de nas gzhan yang nod par bya //
T02D1577:9b-27: yi ge brgya pa sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02D1577:9b-28: tshigs bcad gsum gyis bzod par gsol //
T02D1577:9b-29: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol //
T02D1577:9b-30: man ngag bzhin du dkyil 'khor bsdu //
